name: simple_agent_maps_grounded
description: AI assistant that grounds answers using Google Maps search and always cites sources
useCases: Find nearby restaurants and services for personal errands
Scout locations for client meetings and company events
Research office locations when expanding to new cities
Find vendors and service providers near your business locations
samplePrompts: Find Italian restaurants in Manhattan, New York with outdoor seating and ratings above 4.0 stars. Show me their locations, hours, addresses, and reservation options.
Search for the best-rated coffee shops in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter. Include their addresses, hours, ratings, and what makes them special.
Find event venues in Tokyo's Shibuya district that can accommodate 100+ people, have parking, and are rated 4.5 stars or higher. Include addresses and contact information.
author: Albert Folch
